snippet: AN EARLY-RISING MACHINE.--One of the Birmingham contributions to the World's Fair that affords a considerable amount of amusement, and attracts a good deal of attention, is the alarm bedstead, invented by Savage, of St. James' Square, and manufact...
lead_paragraph: AN EARLY-RISING MACHINE.--One of the Birmingham contributions to the World's Fair that affords a considerable amount of amusement, and attracts a good deal of attention, is the alarm bedstead, invented by Savage, of St. James' Square, and manufactured by Peeton Harlow. To many persons this will be an invention of real utility;
